item.title: demo, run tikzjax from hugo
item.description: I tried to use tikz in my logseq. However it fails to render correctly. Today I have time to try it in my hugo sites. Here is a demo from https://tikzjax.com/ \begin{tikzpicture} \draw (0,0) circle (1in); \end{tikzpicture} )
